RelatedSentence: Southwest Airlines plans to discontinue its nonstop flight from Charlotte to Orlando as of Nov .
Southwest Airlines plans to discontinue its nonstop flight from Charlotte to Orlando as of Nov .
A spokesman said its possible that the flight could return  Southwest hasnt loaded its schedule past Jan .
4  but added theres no indication as of now that the flight will come back .
Southwest started flying from Charlotte last year , after acquiring low - cost carrier AirTran .

The airline currently offers six daily nonstop flights to four destinations : Orlando International Airport , Houstons Hobby Airport , Baltimore-Washington International , and Chicago Midway International .
Southwests flights from Charlotte to its other three destinations wont change , the company said .
